animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal.
🥜 People often see me at the circus.
💧 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I meow and love to chase mice. I purr when I am happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I am often kept as a pet.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with string.

animal.question: I quack and swim in ponds. I have webbed feet. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐥 Baby ones are called ducklings.
🌾 I like to eat bread.
🌧️ I love being in the rain.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love bones
🏡 I guard the house
🐾 I have four legs

animal.question: I roar and live in the jungle. I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane.
🐾 I am a big cat.
🍖 I love to eat meat.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I live in a burrow.
🌿 I am a herbivore.
🐇 Some people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I am green and live in water. I have sharp teeth and like to snap. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐊 I am a reptile.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.
🛶 I live in swamps and rivers.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I live in the jungle.
🌳 I like to climb.
🗣️ I make a 'ooh ooh ah ah' sound.

animal.question: I am a bird that can't fly and lives in the South Pole. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I waddle when I walk.
🧊 I swim in very cold water.
🐟 I eat fish.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 Each one of us has unique stripes.
🐎 I look a little like a horse.
🌾 I eat grass.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes a flower. I need water and sun to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.
☀️ I grow in the garden.
💧 You need to water me.

plant.question: I am big and tall, and I have many leaves and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall (autumn).
🌳 I am made of wood.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a tree and am red, yellow, or green. Doctors say one a day keeps them away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I'm a healthy snack.
🥧 You can make pie with me.
🐛 Sometimes a worm lives in me.

plant.question: I grow underground and have a brown or red skin and white or yellow flesh. You can make fries out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am often served with ketchup.
🥔 I am a root vegetable.
🌎 I grow in the ground.

plant.question: I am a tall, thin plant with golden kernels. You can pop me to make a tasty snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🌽 I grow on a cob.
🐔 Chickens like to eat me.

plant.question: I am a flower that follows the sun and produces seeds that you can eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My name sounds like where the sun lives.
☀️ I turn my head to follow the sun.
🐦 Birds love to eat my seeds.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant that produces a sweet, juicy fruit in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am often purple, green, or red.
🍷 You can make juice and wine from me.
🌿 I grow on a vine.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. I can store water inside of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have sharp needles to protect me.
🏜️ I am found in hot, dry places.
🐪 Camels sometimes eat me for water.

plant.question: I am a type of green plant that floats on water and am home to frogs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Frogs like to sit on me.
💧 I live on the surface of ponds and lakes.
🥬 I am a flat, round pad.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree with red bark and am found in California. I am one of the tallest and oldest living things on Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am a type of evergreen tree.
🐻 I grow in the forests of California.
🪵 I am a giant!
